A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Beautiful movie. It's a very different take on Star Wars. Does some things with vital characters that many will take issue with\, but I thought were creative and were a natural fit to the story. I had 1 major issue with Luke Skywalker in the final scenes of the movie just because of how it impacts episode 9 and what his arc could have been if not for what happens in that scene. Love the Kylo Ren and Rey story arc. Overall a great Star Wars movie. Top 4 for me. Maybe even higher after I live with it a little longer.
